title: VEVOR Heated Hoodie with Battery - Unisex, Black (Medium)
description:
VEVOR Heated Hoodie with Battery – Unisex Thermal Sweatshirt for Cold Weather Comfort (Medium)

Stay warm and stylish in chilly weather with the VEVOR Heated Hoodie with Battery, the ultimate unisex solution for lasting comfort and innovation. Featuring five advanced heating zones, this hoodie ensures full-body warmth by targeting the chest, back, and abdomen. It’s the perfect companion for outdoor adventures, daily commutes, or relaxing at home.

With three adjustable heat settings ranging from 95°F to 140°F and powered by a durable 16,000mAh battery, you’ll enjoy up to 10 hours of customizable warmth. Made from a premium cotton-polyester blend with a cozy polar fleece lining, this hoodie combines durability, breathability, and softness for long-lasting wear. Designed for both men and women, its sleek black design ensures versatile functionality and style.

Why You’ll Love It:

Advanced Heating Technology: Five zones strategically placed for consistent warmth.

Personalized Comfort: Three adjustable heat levels to suit your preferences.

All-Day Warmth: Up to 10 hours of heat with the powerful 16,000mAh battery.

Premium Materials: Durable cotton-polyester blend with a moisture-wicking polar fleece lining.

Safe & Reliable: Built-in overheating protection for secure use.

Unisex Design: Modern, versatile black design suitable for all occasions.

Benefits:

Stay warm during outdoor activities, commutes, or chilly moments at home.

Tailor your comfort with easy-to-use temperature controls.

Experience durability and coziness with high-quality materials.

Elevate your winter wardrobe with a functional yet stylish heated hoodie.

Enjoy peace of mind with advanced safety features.

Who It’s For:

Outdoor Enthusiasts: Ideal for hiking, camping, and other winter activities.

Daily Commuters: Keeps you warm on frosty mornings or evening travels.

Comfort Seekers: Perfect for cozy lounging during cold days.

Eco-Conscious Individuals: Great for those prioritizing durability and sustainability.

Style-Minded Users: Designed for individuals seeking functional, fashionable winter gear.

Specifications:

Material: Cotton-polyester blend with polar fleece lining.

Heating Zones: Five (chest, back, and abdomen).

Temperature Settings: Adjustable between 95°F and 140°F.

Battery: 16,000mAh for up to 10 hours of heat.

Safety: Advanced overheating protection included.

Color: Black.

Size: Medium (M).

Weight: 2.65 lbs (1.2 kg).

Stay cozy and effortlessly stylish this winter with the VEVOR Heated Hoodie with Battery. Combining cutting-edge heating technology and sustainable comfort, this hoodie is your go-to solution for any cold-weather scenario. Ready to embrace winter in style? ❄️✨
